mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.channel_name AS "channelName", a.channel_type AS "channelType", a.channel_alias AS "channelAlias", a.goods_qty AS "goodsQty", a.channel_status AS "channelStatus", a.sort AS "sort", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.channel_img AS "channelImg", a.channel_url AS "channelUrl", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_channel( channel_name, channel_type, channel_alias, goods_qty, channel_status, sort, start_time, end_time, channel_img, channel_url, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, merchant_id ) VALUES ( #{channelName}, #{channelType}, #{channelAlias}, #{goodsQty}, #{channelStatus}, #{sort}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{channelImg}, #{channelUrl}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{merchantId} )

INSERT INTO goods_channel
channel_name,
channel_type,
channel_alias,
goods_qty,
channel_status,
sort,
start_time,
end_time,
channel_img,

merchant_id,

mapper.update: UPDATE goods_channel SET channel_name = #{channelName}, channel_type = #{channelType}, channel_alias = #{channelAlias}, goods_qty = #{goodsQty}, channel_status = #{channelStatus}, sort = #{sort}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, channel_img = #{channelImg}, channel_url = #{channelUrl}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, merchant_id = #{merchantId} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE goods_channel
channel_name = #{channelName},
channel_type = #{channelType},
channel_alias = #{channelAlias},
goods_qty = #{goodsQty},
channel_status = #{channelStatus},
sort = #{sort},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
channel_img = #{channelImg},
channel_url = #{channelUrl},
remarks = #{remarks},
update_by = #{updateBy.id},
update_date = #{updateDate},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
WHERE id = #{id}
